name: biidCoreSDK
summary: biid is a mobile identity platform that secures digital infrastructures.
description: biid is a mobile identity platform that secures and protects digital infrastructures while allowing users to easily authenticate online, authorise transactions, sign legal documents and provide consent, all in accordance to the new eIDAS, GDPR, PSD2 and Open Banking requirements in Europe and internationally. At the core of biid there is our mobile PKI technology turning Android & iOS smartphones into secure and easy-to-use personal devices that can replace traditional smart-card and token-based digital identities.

license.text: Your right to use this Software and obtain maintenance & support from biid is subject to Your compliance with the terms and conditions of a valid biid Mobile ID Enterprise Agreement
